means: 逐渐变少或变小( dwindle的现在分词 )

sentence.Network_en: Exports are dwindling and the trade deficit is swelling.
sentence.Network_cn: 出口在缩减，贸易赤字在增长。

sentence.Network_en: The number of wild animals on the earth is dwindling.
sentence.Network_cn: 地球上野生动物的数量正日渐减少.

sentence.Network_en: And yesterday the Zoo's fate was sealed, largely due to two months of ever-dwindling entrance figures.
sentence.Network_cn: 昨日，伦敦动物园面临着关闭的命运，主要因为两个月来游客数量持续下滑。

PerfectNetExp.abs: warn the reader of the dwindling water supply ., 警告读者要注意日益减少的水资源问题.
Red Talons guard the dwindling wolf packs across the world ., 红色魔爪越过世界保护那些日益缩小的狼组织.
Our dwindling supplies were replenished when the new shipment arrived., 新的货物运到时 , 我们那日趋减少的储备物资得到了补充.

list.abs: 背单词_清灵忆梦吧_百度贴吧 ... swear wear 发誓要穿上 dwindle wind 风吹过，沙子量减少 swine wine 卑鄙的人在喝酒.
dwindle down to 缩减到...dwindle into 缩小成dwindle out 逐渐消失
fxsysy ... 补助饲喂( supplementary feeding) 春衰( spring dwindling) 定地养蜂( beekeeping in permanent apiary).
Most of the dwindling takings are used to pay off winning bets ., 大部分减少的收入都被用于支付赛马投中的奖金.

entry.def: If something dwindles, it becomes smaller, weaker, or less in number.

example.ex: The factory's workforce has dwindled from over 4,000 to a few hundred...
example.tran: 工厂雇员总数已经从 4,000 多人减少到几百人。

example.ex: Exports are dwindling and the trade deficit is swelling...
example.tran: 出口在缩减，贸易赤字在增长。

sentences.sentence: "there is no greater sadness that the dwindling away of a family"

auth_sentence.content: Space which, these days, is dwindling fast.
auth_sentence.res_content: Space which, these days, is dwindling fast.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: Space which, these days, is dwindling fast.

auth_sentence.content: But patience is dwindling in the United States.
auth_sentence.res_content: But patience is dwindling in the United States.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: But patience is dwindling in the United States.
